cl_press_respawn_b: PRESS [E] TO RESPAWN - PRESS [G] TO CALL FOR ASSISTANCE
cl_error_c: not able to do that right now!
cl_bag_no_medicbag: No Medic Bag to pick up.
cl_need_kit: You need a First Aid Kit
cl_no_access_facility: You do not have access to this medical facility
cl_pharmacist_only: Only Pharmacists and above can access pharmaceutical supplies
cl_mission_active: You already have an active mission!
cl_no_missions_job: No available missions for your medic job!
cl_mission_gps_set: Mission ID: %s | GPS has been set to location!
sv_revive: Revive A Player or Yourself (Admin Only)
sv_heal: Heal A Player or Yourself (Admin Only)
sv_wounds_cleared: Your wounds and fractures have been cleared
sv_wounds_cleared_admin: Your wounds and fractures have been cleared by an admin
sv_wounds_cleared_player: Wounds and fractures cleared for player %s
qc_temporaryWound: You feel the pain temporarily lessen
qc_multipleWounds: You feel a lot of pain
qc_bodyFailIgnore: Now you can ignore your body's failure
qc_neednoTreatment: There is no parts that need treatment:
qc_partsreset: The following body parts have been reset:
qc_nopartbeenreset: No body parts have been reset.
qc_leeding_reduced_state: Bleeding has been reduced. Current bleeding state:
qc_leeding_stopped_state: Bleeding has been stopped. Current bleeding state:
wound_bullet_lodged: Bullet lodged in tissue - surgical removal required
wound_entry_exit: Entry and exit wound - bullet passed through cleanly
wound_healed_scar: Your %s injury has healed and left a scar
wound_bandage_expired: Your %s bandage has expired - blood may seep through
wound_getting_worse: Your untreated %s wound is getting worse - seek medical attention!
wound_multiple_bleeding: Multiple bleeding wounds are weakening you (%d total damage) - consider bandaging
wound_bleeding_weakening: Bleeding from %s wound is weakening you - consider bandaging
wound_bullet_removed: Bullet successfully removed from %s - bleeding has increased
treatment_no_wounds_tourniquet: No wounds detected that require tourniquet
treatment_no_bleeding_tourniquet: No bleeding wounds found for tourniquet
treatment_applied_medicine: Applied %s for pain management to %d body part(s)
treatment_no_pain_conditions: Patient has no pain conditions requiring medicine
treatment_no_wound_bandage: No wound found on %s to bandage
treatment_different_treatment: This wound requires different treatment (bleeding level: %d)
treatment_no_wound_tourniquet: No wound found on %s to apply tourniquet
treatment_use_bandage: This bleeding level (%d) does not require tourniquet. Use bandage instead.
treatment_tourniquet_applied: Applied %s to %s for severe bleeding control
mission_all_treated: All %d medical conditions have been properly treated. Excellent work!
mission_ready_transport: The patient is ready for transport. They will follow you to the medical station.
mission_following: The patient is now following you. Lead them to the medical station.
mission_following_station: Patient is now following you. Head to the medical station.
mission_mounted_horse: The patient has mounted your horse.
mission_dismounted: The patient has dismounted and will continue following you.
mission_delivered: Patient delivered successfully. You can now begin surgical procedures.
mission_inspect_patient: Inspect the patient to begin surgical procedures.
mission_closer_patient: You need to be closer to the patient to load them.
mission_loaded_vehicle: Patient loaded successfully. Drive to the medical station.
mission_at_station: You need to be at the medical station to unload the patient.
mission_moved_surgery: Patient has been moved to the surgery room. Begin surgical procedures.
mission_select_procedures: Select procedures to perform on the patient
mission_procedures_complete: All surgical procedures completed. Finish mission.
mission_need_item: You need %s to perform this procedure.
mission_patient_stable: All surgical procedures completed. The patient is stable and recovering.
fracture_fall_injury: The fall may have %s your %s! Seek immediate medical attention.
snake_bite_venomous: The snake bite may be venomous! Seek treatment immediately.
vitals_normalPulse: Strong, regular pulse. Patient appears stable.
vitals_elevatedPulse: Pulse slightly elevated. Patient may be in mild distress.
vitals_fastPulse: Rapid pulse detected. Patient shows signs of significant distress.
vitals_criticalPulse: Dangerously fast pulse. Patient in critical condition.
vitals_weakPulse: Weak, irregular pulse. Patient is barely clinging to life.
vitals_unconsciousPulse: Patient is unconscious. Weak, irregular pulse detected.
vitals_noPulse: Patient shows no signs of life. No pulse or breathing detected.
ui_holdToCheckVitals: Hold the button below for 3 seconds to check vitals
ui_cleanWound: Clean wound thoroughly before applying any bandage
ui_changeBandages: Change bandages regularly to prevent infection
ui_watchInfection: Watch for signs of infection: swelling, pus, unusual odor
ui_applyProximal: Apply proximal to bleeding source, never over joints
ui_tightenUntilStop: Tighten until bleeding stops - document application time
ui_riskLimbLoss: Risk of limb loss if left on too long - monitor closely
ui_wildWestMedical: Wild West medical tools and supplies
ui_ensureSwallow: Ensure patient can swallow before administering oral medications
ui_monitorReactions: Monitor patient for adverse reactions after administration
ui_drowsinessWarning: Some medicines may cause drowsiness or altered consciousness
ui_properTechnique: Use proper injection technique to avoid nerve damage
ui_paincondiFound: No wounds discovered yet. Perform body inspection to identify pain conditions
ui_holdToCheckTemperature: Hold the button below for 3 seconds
ui_noWoundsDiscovered: No wounds discovered yet. Perform body inspection to identify bleeding wounds.
ui_noLightBleedingWounds: No light/moderate bleeding wounds discovered (requires bleeding level 1-6).
ui_noSevereBleedingDiscovered: No wounds discovered yet. Perform body inspection to identify severe bleeding.
ui_noSevereBleedingWounds: No severe bleeding wounds discovered (requires bleeding level 7+).
ui_noEmergencyConditions: No emergency conditions found (requires severe pain 8+ or critical bleeding 7+).
ui_noPainConditions: No pain conditions discovered (requires pain level 1+).
ui_criticalInjuryDetected: Critical injury detected - immediate attention required
sv_must_be_medic_pharma: You must be a medic to purchase pharmaceutical items
sv_pharmacist_only: Only Pharmacists and above can purchase pharmaceutical supplies
sv_not_enough_space: You do not have enough inventory space
sv_medical_personnel_only: Only medical personnel can inspect patients
sv_medical_personnel_only_treatment: Only medical personnel can apply treatments
sv_no_required_supplies: You do not have the required medical supplies
sv_no_required_treatment: You do not have the required treatment item
sv_medical_personnel_only_inspect: Only medical personnel can perform inspections
sv_need_closer_patient: You need to be closer to the patient
sv_not_medical_professional: You are not a medical professional
sv_player_id_not_online: Player with ID %s is not online
sv_must_be_closer_inspection: You must be closer to the patient to perform an inspection
sv_revived_smelling_salts: You have been revived with smelling salts
sv_elevated_temperature: Patient has elevated temperature - %d active infection(s)
sv_medical_professional_examining: A medical professional is examining you
